summary: In 1930's Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings moves to Florida's backwaters to write in peace. She feels bothered by affectionate men, editor and confused neighbors, but soon she connects and writes The Yearling, a classic of American literature.
cast: Mary Steenburgen|Rip Torn|Peter Coyote|Dana Hill|Alfre Woodard|Joanna Miles|Ike Eisenmann|Cary Guffey|Toni Hudson|Bo Rucker|Jay O. Sanders|John Hammond|Tommy Alford|Norton Baskin|Terrence Gehr|Keith Michel|Nora Rogers|Kenneth V. Vickery|C.T. Wakefield|Malcolm McDowell
title: Los mejores a√±os de mi vida
